page.title: 19Thoughts on Thurmaston.
page.content: I think Thurmaston is a good place to live because the factories are in three clumps and the rest is shops, houses and parks. There are quite a lot of shops in the village and a big Superstore. There are lots of friendly people and lots of places to go to like clubs including Judo, Squash, Cricket, Cubs, Scouts, Brownies and Guides.There are also lots of pubs and clubs for adults. I go to the British Legion with my dad. It has got a games room with a pool table, two dart boards and a table video game. It is a very safe place. On the main roads, like the Bypass, there are foot bridges and an under pass. There are definitely enough facilities in Thurmaston because we are only a small village.
